mapper.select:
SELECT *FROM emp_info WHERE emp_contractStatus = '1' AND emp_stat='1'
and emp_contractEndTime < #{empContractendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT *FROM emp_info WHERE emp_tryStatus = '1' AND emp_stat='1'
and emp_tryOutEndTime < #{empTryoutendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT count(*) FROM emp_info WHERE emp_inductionTime >= #{0} AND emp_inductionTime < #{1}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emp_info WHERE emp_departureTime >= #{0} AND emp_departureTime < #{1}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emp_info WHERE emp_inductionTime < #{0} AND emp_departureTime > #{1}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emp_info WHERE emp_departureTime > #{0} AND emp_inductionTime < #{1} AND emp_dept in ('孵化二','孵化一')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emp_info WHERE emp_departureTime > #{0} AND emp_inductionTime < #{1} AND emp_dept in ('财务处','综合管理处','平行工作室')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emp_info WHERE emp_dept=#{0} AND emp_stat='1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM emp_info WHERE emp_title=#{0} AND emp_stat='1'
select e. *, a.url as url from emp_info e left join emp_avatarinfo a on e.eid=a.id where e.eid=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
